Beautiful, where is  this? At one time I could have enjoyed that run. I never did super good in deep powder and probably would have slowed down or fall down a few times. description: Andrea Johnson  added  a photo and a video  ‚Äî with  Suzi Abramson-Johnson  and  4 others . Happy 10 months to Silas!  Poor thing has a cold so he wasn't feeling well for his photo shoot. The 1st pic you'll notice his onesie isn't all the way buttoned. He'll roll away from his diaper change before I can finishing buttoning him back up. 2nd pic shows how well he stands on his own. 3rd pic is what I do all day. Keep him from falling over the back of the couch. He can crawl on the couch, crawl up most of the back cushion and try and rip the blinds off all on his own. He's taking a few steps here and there, but he's figured out that he's a fast crawler. He keeps us very busy.

description: Andrea Johnson  added  a photo and a video  ‚Äî with  Suzi Abramson-Johnson  and  4 others . Silas is 11 months old today!  No belly sticker this month because they were ruined as a result of water damage from a fire in the apartment upstairs.  So today's photo shoot is in the hotel we're staying in.   He's pushing himself up to standing only using the floor. His record is 19 steps without falling. He has 3 teeth on the bottom and 2 are coming in on the top. He's finally starting to grow some more hair. Still into everything with drawers being his new favorite. He loves hanging out with dada before he goes to work. We can't believe he's almost a year old! Andrea Johnson Eric Johnson

description: Andrea Johnson  added  6 new photos  ‚Äî with  Eric Johnson . The apartment 2 floors above us had a fire and we suffered quite a bit of water damage in Silas's bedroom and bathroom. No one was hurt but we have to be out of the apartment for a few weeks as a lot of demolition and rebuilding has to be done to the ceiling, walls and floors.  Needless to say these Halloween photos are late, but we did have a nice Halloween as a Beekeeper, Queen Bee, and our little bumblebee. My minion pumpkin looked awesome on Day 1 but collapsed by the next day.

Suzi Abramson-Johnson  shared a memory. Eric Johnson ,  Anna Vaysman  looked what popped up today ! You are both fabulous dentists! Thanks for your gentle care. Suzi Abramson-Johnson  ¬∑  August 9, 2013  ¬∑  I thought I could contain myself and not post but I can't....... (sorry Eric if this is embarrassing.)  I want to thank my fabulous son  Eric Johnson  for his stea ... dy gentle hands today.  I am now his patient at the Midwestern University Dental Clinic and he filled a cavity for me.  Words can't express a mother's pride and joy to witness first hand (or mouth in this case) how happy my child is doing what he loves.  And he's really good.  Class 3 filling done perfectly!  And that's not what I said but what his instructor said after she checked it out.  Can't wait to go back for the crown next month.  Knowing that he will be doing it, takes away the fear I have had for over 50 years about going to the dentist.  Just gotta say - ERIC - you're awesome!  Thanks to Anna for your guidance & assisting.  You will make a great dentist as well.   See More
Eric Johnson

comments.content: cuz, you are a great momma, and raised a great man!

hahaha, it's kind of embarrassing because I don't go to the dentist very often....My mouth may be gross (although I am very good at brushing!)...how is the clinic as far as pricing goes? And to be honest I don't even know where the clinic is...after 2 years on campus! I am assuming its across the street, lol

Yes, across the street and it's beautiful. The pricing is much cheaper than a regular dentist - maybe even half.  And you would be supporting your fellow students as well.  You get a 3rd year, a fourth year and an instructor.  And don't worry, they are used to gross mouths!

description: Ryan Walden  added  2 new photos  ‚Äî with  Eric Johnson  and  93 others . It's time to open another chapter in the story of our academy. The RFLX name will always be a part of our journey- It's the name that we have worn on our kimonos when stepping onto the battlefield. It's the name our kids wear with confidence, knowing the skills they've gained. RFLX has become ,to me, an understanding of, "Fear None-Respect All." The roots to our tree.   I've wanted for sometime now to give title to the "gentle art" at our dojo. The mat has been our canvas, students the paintbrushes...  RFLX proudly introduces SOLFLO Jiu Jitsu, the blending of will and skill.  Inspired by the way Jiu jitsu expresses itself; flowing like water but giving like the sun. The elements of life and growth.   We are ready for this new chapter of the journey to begin and we thank you for being the inspiration and support throughout this evolution.   Our team has helped create an amazing culture of family, tenacity and perseverance- we believe SOLFLO represents our family best and we look forward to FLO'ing into the future!   "Flow with the go."   -Rickson Gracie      # teamSOLFLO   # SOLFLOjiujitsu   # SOLFLOgrapplers   # SOLFLOmuaythai    # SOLFLOcompteam     # SOLFLOfighters   # theSOLFLOdojo     # RFLXsolfloFAMILY

description: Rory Barrett  added  6 new photos  ‚Äî with  Eric Johnson  and  3 others . Sept 24th, 2017  Many thanks to everybody for the birthday greetings; I am in Toulouse for my birthday, which has now become my 2nd favorite city after Cork, Ireland. Toulouse is life in pink (La Vie en Rose.)  It has been a crazy last 3-4 years for me, I‚Äôm on my 9th trip to Toulouse for work in the past 3 years, the next trip may be the last to Toulouse as GOLD ships to French Giuana for launch preparations at the end of 2017. It has been hard to be so far from home and my family, however I have had the good fortune to meet a lot of great people here in Toulouse through work and through Jiu Jitsu!  Apparently 47 is when men are in their prime, and that is my age today. Yesterday I had a great day of grappling and may have challenged some people to a few big fights next week before I leave. (yikes, hopefully that was not a bad idea!) SO, I have nothing to loose on the following announcement: I‚Äôm planning to do the IBJJF masters worlds next year in 2018, in Las Vegas. (August sometime.)  I‚Äôll compete in Blue belt Masters 4 (46-50) so when you ask me my age I‚Äôll tell you I‚Äôm only 4. I will need to train hard for this competition but that is a good thing as I have figured out that Jiu Jitsu is the glue that keeps me together and also keeps my feet on the ground.  The photos below are of my major competition and I am confident that I will destroy this guy.   Thanks everybody for your love and support. I‚Äôm excited for my next year, and what is around the corner.  Rory   # jiujitsuxfamily   # cantstopwontstop   # theirisharecoming   # SOLFLObjj  # ‚Ä™ # teamSOLFLO   # SOLFLO   # jiujitsuchangedmylife   # jjb   # Irishisawesome Katie Cuffe

description: Suzi Abramson-Johnson  is  feeling loved. Thank you all so much for your FB , texts, phone calls celebrating my 59th bday. I apologize that I couldn't talk to each one of you individually.  You are all a part of my past and hopefully my future and mean a lot to me. Hope we can talk soon.   It was an magical celebration with my beloved Phil of 36 years (tomorrow),  our amazing, talented,  successful children,  ScottandSarah Johnson ,  Eric Johnson ,  and  Andrea Johnson  and the icing on the cake,  our sweet, adorable,  delicious Grandchildren,  Karlie Anora,  Silas Earl,  Charlotte Edee, and #4 , spent in a beautiful house in Oceanside,  CA. Spending beach time with them all,  playing at the playground , train ride, reading stories, so many meals... ......was incredible.  I LOVED every moment. Dreams do come true! Suzi

description: Suzi Abramson-Johnson  added  a photo and a video  ‚Äî  feeling emotional with  Andrea Johnson  and  3 others  at  Southwest Airlines at DEN . Words can't describe the incredible weekend I had with Silas Earl,  the kids and our friends! He is incredibly smart and sweet.   Happy and grateful to have this time together, but very sad to leave.  Next time we'll be back we will be meeting our newest grandson! It will be hard to wait,  thank goodness we have Skype.
